thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: MarMar

author: MarMar
title: MarMar
text: Helpful customer service. Sadly the item I purchased was not functioning correctly so I contacted their customer service. While their answers were not immediate (being that I am in the US and they in Asia/Time zone differences), their email replies were no longer than 24 hours. Customer Service worked with me extensively and included detailed pictures, which work well with me, so appreciated. The issue is being resolved and I look forward to buying from Banggood again.
